net.semanticmetadata.lire.utils

Class LuceneUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.semanticmetadata.lire.utils.LuceneUtils

  • public class LuceneUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides some common functions for Lucene. As there are many changes to the API of Lucene over time this class is the central place to change common variable like the employed Lucene version. User: Mathias Date: 03.08.11 Time: 09:33
    Author:
    Mathias Lux, mathias@juggle.at, Nektarios Anagnostopoulos, nek.anag@gmail.com
